Text:
Do not bother to download..

For some reason ThePirateBay got "404 - Not Found" on this torrent and now I need to re-upload it..

I guess there are too many files inside the torrent. So the next one I'll do it in a single RAR archive or ISO. I will put [Fixed] or something like that after the torrent name, to be able to recognize it..

Seems ThePirateBay fix the "404 - Not Found" torrent problem and now everything works perfect for me.

Now you can really download it and I'll try seeding as much as I can..
